Title: Four Walls and a Roof
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Angela Kang, Corey Reed
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: With Bob's life hanging in the balance, the group prepares to fight back against Gareth and his group of cannibals.
